snippet.title: The Plucky Squire Is a Stunning Nintendo-Inspired Action Adventure | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
The Plucky Squire is an upcoming action adventure game that follows the magical adventures of storybook heroes Jot and his friends, who discover a 3D world outside the pages of their book. Co-director and artist James Turner joins us to talk about how players can hop between the indie game’s 2D and 3D worlds, change words on the page to solve puzzles, and more.

The Plucky Squire is coming to PC, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch in 2024.

#IGN
